sentences: In 2011, due to family issues on the part of Firewind's lead singer Apollo, Levén was called in to substitute for the rest of their European tour.
He also started touring with Trans-Siberian Orchestra in 2016.
In 2019, he released his first solo album under the name Skyblood.
In 2021 he became a member of the band around the Dutch guitarist 'Ad van den Berg'.
